chapter.text: 38|1|Soyada [1], sapatha upadesapurna kura'anera
38|2|baram kaphirara aud'dhatya o birodhitaya nipatita ache.
38|3|Edera age amara bahu janagosthi dhbansa karechi; takhana tara arta citkara karechila. Kintu takhana paritranera kono'i samaya chila na.
38|4|Ara tara bismaya bodha karache ye, edera kache edera'i madhya theke ekajana satarkakari asala ebam kaphirara bale, 'e to eka jadukara [1], mithyabadi.
38|5|Se ki bahu ilahake eka ilaha baniye niyeche? Eta to eka atyascarya byapara
38|6|ara tadera netara e bale sare pare ye, 'tomara cale ya'o ebam tomadera debatagulora pujaya tomara abicalita thaka. Niscaya'i e byaparati uddesyamulaka.
38|7|Amara to an'ya dharmadarse [1] erupa katha sunini; eta eka managara ukti matra.
38|8|Amadera madhye ki tara'i upara yik‌ra (bani) nayila hala? Prakrtapakse tara to amara banite (kura'ane) sandihana. Baram tara ekhano amara sasti asbadana kareni.
38|9|Naki tadera kache ache apanara rabera anugrahera bhandara, yini parakramasali, mahana data
38|10|naki tadera kartrtba ache asamanasamuha o yamina ebam e du’yera antarbati samasta kichura upara? Thakale, tara kono upaya abalambana kare arohana karuka
38|11|e bahini sekhane abasya'i parajita habe, purbabati dalasamuhera mata [1].
38|12|Edera age'o rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila nuhera sampradaya, ‘ada o kilaka'oyala phira'a'una [1]
38|13|samuda, luta sampradaya o a'ika'ra adhibasi; ora chila eka-ekati bisala bahini.
38|14|Tadera pratyeke'i rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila. Phale tadera ksetre amara sasti chila yathartha..
38|15|Ara era to kebala apeksa karache ekati matra pracanda sabdera, yate kono birama thakabe na [1].
38|16|Ara tara bale, 'he amadera raba! Hisaba dibasera age'i amadera prapya [1] amaderake sighra'i diye dina
38|17|tara ya bale tate apani dhairya dharana karuna ebam smarana karuna amadera saktisali banda da'udera katha; tini chilena khuba besi allaha abhimukhi [1].
38|18|Niscaya amara anugata karechilama parbatamalake, yena egulo sakala- sandhyaya tara sathe amara pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare
38|19|ebam samabeta pakhiderake'o; saba'i chila tara abhimukhi [1].
38|20|Ara amara tara rajyake sudrrha karechilama ebam take diyechilama hikamata o phayasalakari bagmita [1].
38|21|Ara apanara kache bibadamana lokadera brttanta paumcheche ki? Yakhana tara pracira diniye asala ‘ibadatakhanaya

38|22|yakhana tara da'udera kache prabesa karala, takhana tadera karane tini bhita haye paralena. Tara balala, 'bhita habena na, amara du'i bibadamana paksa---amadera eke an'yera upara simalanghana kareche; ata'eba apani amadera madhye n'yaya bicara karuna; abicara karabena na ebam amaderake sathika patha pradarsana karuna.

38|23|Niscaya e byakti amara bha'i, era ache niranabba'iti bheri [1]. Ara amara ache matra ekati bheri. Tabu'o se bale, ‘amara yim'maya eti diye da'o' ebam kathaya se amara prati praadhan'ya bistara kareche.

38|24|Da'uda balalena, 'tomara bheritike tara bherigulora sange yukta karara dabi kare se tomara prati yuluma kareche. Ara sarikadera aneke eke an'yera upara to simalanghana kare thake---kare na sudhu yara imana ane ebam satkaja kare, ara tara sankhyaya sbalpa.’ Ara da'uda bujhate paralena, amara to take pariksa karalama. Atahpara tini tara rabera kache ksama prarthana karalena ebam nata haye lutiye paralena [1], ara tamra abhimukhi halena.
38|25|Atahpara amara tara krati ksama karalama. Ara niscaya amadera kache tara jan'ya rayeche naikatyera maryada o uttama pratyabartanasthala.

38|26|‘He da'uda! Amara apanake yamine khalipha baniyechi, ata'eba apani lokadera madhye subicara karuna ebam kheyala-khusira anusarana karabena na. Kenana eta apanake allahara patha theke bicyuta karabe.’ Niscaya yara allahara patha theke bhrasta haya tadera jan'ya rayeche kathina sasti. Karana, tara bicara dinake bhule ache.

38|27|Ara amara asamana, yamina o e duyera madhyabarti kono kichu'i anarthaka srsti karini [1]. Anarthaka srsti karara dharana tadera yara kuphari kareche, kaje'i yara kuphari kare tadera jan'ya rayeche agunera durbhoga.
38|28|Yara imana ane o satkaja kare amara ki taderake yamine biparyaya srstikaridera samana ganya karaba? Naki amara muttakiderake aparadhidera samana ganya karaba
38|29|eka mubaraka kitaba, eta amara apanara prati nayila karechi, yate manusa era ayatasamuhe gabhirabhabe cinta kare ebam yate bodhasaktisampanna byaktira grahana kare upadesa.
38|30|Ara amara da'udake dana karalama sula'imana [1]. Kata'i na uttama banda tini! Niscaya tini chilena atisaya allaha abhimukhi.
38|31|Yakhana bikele tara samane drutagami utkrsta asbarajike [1] pesa kara hala
38|32|takhana tini balalena, 'ami to amara rabera smarana hate bimukha haye aisbarya pritite magna haye parechi, edike surya pardara arale cale geche
38|33|‘eguloke amara kache phiriye ana.' Tarapara tini egulora pa ebam gala chedana karate lagalena [1].
38|34|Ara abasya'i amara sula'imanake pariksa karalama ebam tara asanera upara rakhalama ekati dhara [1]; tarapara sula'imana amara abhimukhi halena.
38|35|Tini balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amake ksama karuna ebam amake dana karuna emana eka rajya [1] ya amara para ara kara'o jan'ya'i prayojya habe na. Niscaya apani parama data.
38|36|Takhana amara tara adhina kare dilama bayuke ya tara adese tini yekhane icche karatena sekhane mrdumandabhabe prabahita hata
38|37|ara (adhina kare dilama) pratyeka prasada nirmanakari o duburi sayatanasamuhake'o
38|38|ebam srnkhale abad'dha ara'o anekake [1]
38|39|‘esaba amadera anugraha, ata'eba e theke apani an'yake dite ba nije rakhate parena. Era jan'ya apanake hiseba dite habe na.
38|40|Ara niscaya amadera kache rayeche tara jan'ya naikatyera maryada o uttama pratyabartanasthala.
38|41|Ara smarana karuna, amadera banda a'i'ubake, yakhana tini tara rabake balechilena, ‘sayatana to amake yantrana o kaste pheleche
38|42|(ami take balalama) ‘apani apanara pa dbara bhumite aghata karuna, e'i to gosalera susitala pani o paniya [1].
38|43|Ara amara take dana karalama tara parijanabarga o tadera mata aro aneka; amadera paksa theke anugrahasbarupa ebam bodhasakti sampanna lokadera jan'ya upadesasbarupa [1].

38|44|Ara (ami take adesa karalama) ekamutha ghasa nina ebam ta dbara aghata karuna ebam sapatha bhanga karabena na.' Niscaya amara take peyechi dhairyasila [1]. Kata'i uttama banda tini! Niscaya tini chilena amara abhimukhi.
38|45|Ara smarana karuna, amadera banda ibarahima, isahaka o iya'kubera katha, tamra chilena saktisali o suksmadarsi.
38|46|Niscaya amara taderake adhikari karechilama eka bisesa gunera, ta chila akhiratera smarana [1].
38|47|Ara niscaya tara chilena amadera nikata manonita uttama bandadera an'yatama.
38|48|Ara smarana karuna, isama'ila, ala-iyasa'a o yula-kiph‌lera katha, ara era pratyeke'i chilena sajjanadera antarbhukta.
38|49|E eka smarana’ [1]. Muttakidera jan'ya rayeche uttama abasa
38|50|cirasthayi jannata, yara darajasamuha tadera jan'ya unmukta [1].
38|51|Sekhane tara asina habe helana diye, sekhane tara bahubidha phalamula o paniya ca'ibe.
38|52|Ara tadera pase thakabe anatanayana samabayaskara.
38|53|Eta hisebera dinera jan'ya tomaderake deya pratisruti.
38|54|Niscaya eta amadera deya riyika ya nihsesa ha'oyara naya.
38|55|Eta'i. Ara niscaya simalanghanakaridera jan'ya rayeche nikrstatama pratyabartanasthala
38|56|jahannama, sekhane tara agnidagdha habe, kata nikrsta bisramasthala
38|57|eta'i. Kaje'i tara asbadana karuka phutanta pani o pumja [1].
38|58|Aro ache erupa bibhinna dharanera sasti [1].
38|59|E to eka bahini, tomadera sange prabesa karache. Tadera jan'ya ne'i kono abhinandana. Niscaya tara agune jbalabe.’
38|60|Anusarira balabe, ‘baram tomara'o, tomadera jan'ya'o kono abhinandana ne'i. Tomara'i to age amadera jan'ya etara byabastha karecha. Ata'eba kata nikrsta e abasasthala [1]!’
38|61|Tara balabe, 'he amadera raba! Ye etake amadera sam'mukhina kareche, agune tara sasti apani dbiguna bariye dina.
38|62|Tara ara'o balabe, 'amadera ki hala ye, amara yesaba lokake manda bale ganya karatama taderake dekhate pacchi na [1].
38|63|Tabe ki amara taderake (ahetuka) thatta-bidrupera patra mane karatama; na tadera byapare amadera drsti bibhrama ghateche [1]
38|64|niscaya eta bastaba satya--- jahannamidera e parasparika bada-pratibada.
38|65|Baluna, 'ami to ekajana satarkakari matra ebam satya kono ilah ne'i allaha chara, yini eka, prabala pratapasali.
38|66|Yini asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, prabala parakramasali, mahaksamasila.
38|67|Baluna, 'eta eka mahasambada
38|68|ya theke tomara mukha phiriye niccha.
38|69|‘Urdhbaloka samparke amara kono jnana chila na yakhana tara badanubada karachila [1].
38|70|Amara kache to e ohi eseche ye, ami ekajana spasta satarkakari matra.
38|71|Smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba pheresataderake balechilena, 'ami manusa srsti karachi kada theke
38|72|Atahpara yakhana ami take susama karaba ebam tate amara ruha sancara karaba, takhana tomara tara prati sajadabanata hayo.
38|73|Takhana pheresatara sakale'i sajadabanata hala
38|74|ibalisa chara, se ahankara karala ebam kaphiradera antarbhukta hala.

38|75|Tini balalena, 'he ibalisa! Ami yake amara du'hate [1] srsti karechi, tara prati sajadabanata hate tomake kise badha dila? Tumi ki aud'dhatya prakasa karale, na tumi adhikatara ucca maryadasampanna
38|76|se balala, 'ami tara ceye srestha. Apani amake aguna theke srsti karechena ebam take srsti karechena kada theke.’
38|77|Tini balalena, 'tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o, kenana niscaya tumi bitarita.
38|78|‘Ara niscaya tomara upara amara la'nata thakabe, karmaphala dina paryanta.’
38|79|Se balala, 'he amara raba! Ata'eba apani amake sedina paryanta abakasa dina, ye dina taderake punarut'thita kara habe.
38|80|Tini balalena, 'tahale tumi abakasapraaptadera antarbhukta hale
38|81|‘nirdharita samaya upasthita ha'oyara dina paryanta.
38|82|Se balala, 'apanara ksamata-sam'manera sapatha! Abasya'i ami tadera saba'ike pathabhrasta karaba
38|83|‘tabe tadera madhye apanara ekanistha bandara byatita.
38|84|Tini balalena, ‘tabe eta'i satya, ara ami satya'i bali
38|85|abasya'i tomara dbara o tadera madhye yara tomara anusarana karabe tadera sabara dbara ami jahannama purna karaba.
38|86|Baluna, 'ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono pratidana ca'i na ebam ami krtrimatasrayidera antarbhukta na'i [1].
38|87|E to srstikulera jan'ya upadesa matra! [1].
38|88|Ara era sambada tomara abasya'i janabe, kichudina pare [1].
